verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Keep pressing in. (3x.)
(Repeat.)
If you don't press in against Him,
He will press in against you.
For there's no, no such thing as standing still.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Keep your eyes on the road and not the scenery. (2x.)
Don't you look at every passing thing.
Keep your eyes on Me,
I'm the way. I'm the truth, and I'm the life.
